text:
[Verse]
Golden skies they glow
Shadows start to grow
Whispers of the night
Fading with the light

[Verse 2]
Waves kiss sandy shore
Starry skies implore
Candles in the breeze
Moments just to seize

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams so bright
Colors in the night
Hold me in your gaze
Lost inside this maze

[Verse 3]
Warmth of evening's breath
Touching soft like death
Stars begin to peep
Secrets that we keep

[Bridge]
Heartbeats in the dark
Ignite this lonely spark
Time stands still it seems
Only sunset dreams

[Verse 4]
Laughter fills the air
Magic everywhere
Hands in moonlight dance
Lost in sweet romance
title: Sunset Dreams
